usp.ime.gclib.sensor.orientation

Class DeviceGyroscopeOrientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • usp.ime.gclib.sensor.orientation.DeviceOrientation
      • usp.ime.gclib.sensor.orientation.DeviceGyroscopeOrientation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DeviceGyroscopeOrientation
extends DeviceOrientation
    This class creates a device orientation with gyroscope sensor, but the first orientation is generate by the Compass Orientation
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Renato Avila e Tonny Cordeiro
    See Also:
    DeviceOrientation, DeviceCompassOrientation, Serialized Form
